predicate.note: Frames file for 'branch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with 'diversify'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Sansui was late into the mini-component business and failed *trace* to branch into other new businesses.

roleset.name: branch, fork, split

example.name: phrasal variant
example.text: For its future strategy, Columbia officials said the thrift may branch out into commercial lending or managing outside investments , as well as beefing up more traditional thrift activities.
example.arg: commercial lending or managing outside investments, as well as beefing up more traditional thrift activities

roleset.note: Branch out is probably more common.
